'BBC Radio 1' is a British radio station operated by the British Broadcasting
Corporation which also broadcasts internationally, specialising in current
popular music and chart hits throughout the day. Radio 1 provides alternative
genres after 7:00 pm, including electronic dance, hip hop, rock or interviews.
It is aimed primarily at the 15â29 age group, although the average
age of the audience in 2008 was 33.
categories: Contemporary hit radio stations in the United Kingdom
